classes.card: bg-slate-900/60 border border-slate-800 rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6
classes.primaryButton: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-400 text-slate-950 font-semibold px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all hover:scale-105
classes.secondaryButton: border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-800 text-slate-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all
